{{drawgraph:

target.1 =
    function:mean,
    value:value,
    series:machine.CPU.utilisation.phys.106.2.0|m,
    alias:System,
    interval:1m,

cfg.title = CPU Time 2
cfg.dashboardtitle = 'Node {nodename} ({gid}:{id}) CPU Time 2'
cfg.height = 275px
cfg.width = 500px
cfg.stack = true
cfg.fill = 100
cfg.percentage = true

}}
